bettergrass.title: BetterGrassify Config
bettergrass.betterGrassMode.desc:
§4Väljas §r- tavapärase välimusega muruplokid
§3Kiire §r- pealmine murutekstuur rakendatakse muruplokkide kõigile külgedele (kiire)
§dUhke §r- pealmine murutekstuur rakendatakse dünaamiliselt muruplokkide vajalikele külgedele (aeglane)
bettergrass.betterSnowMode.desc:
§4Off §r- No snow layer will be generated.
§3OptiFine-like §r- Shows a snow layer beneath specific blocks that have at-least one snow layer or snow block near them.
§dLambdaBetterGrass-like §r- Shows a snow layer beneath specific blocks that have at-least "two" snow layers or snow blocks near them.
bettergrass.dirtPaths.desc:
Ühendab ka mullaradasid!

§cVõib põhjustada visuaalseid ebaühtlusi!
bettergrass.farmLands.desc:
Ühendab ka põllumaaplokke!

§cVõib põhjustada visuaalseid ebaühtlusi!
bettergrass.moreBlocks.desc: Grass-like blocks that should be connected on slopes.
bettergrass.noconfig.warn:
§cBetterGrassify for (Neo)Forge 1.20.1 is unable to display a configuration screen due to a limitation in Forge. Please use the configuration file instead. Sorry for the inconvenience!§r

If you're using Embeddium, you can change most of the configurations in the "Video Settings Menu."
